TEXT.English: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage. Opening one, your unit discovers pearls inside.
TEXT.French: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage. Opening one, your unit discovers pearls inside.
TEXT.German: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage. Opening one, your unit discovers pearls inside.
TEXT.Italian: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage. Opening one, your unit discovers pearls inside.
TEXT.Spanish: Una colonia de almejas tiene su hogar debajo del naufragio. Al abrir algunas, tu unidad descubre perlas dentro de ellas.

TEXT.English: Plenty of Shrimps make their home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.French: Plenty of Shrimps make their home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.German: Plenty of Shrimps make their home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.Italian: Plenty of Shrimps make their home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.Spanish: Grandes bancos de gambas tienen su hogar en la zona del naufragio.

TEXT.English: You discover a thick vein of mithril ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a thick vein of mithril ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.German: You discover a thick vein of mithril ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a thick vein of mithril ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Descubres una densa veta de mithril bajo la guarida.

TEXT.English: You find nothing more than a single room with a weird sign daubed on the wall, but after you left you can't banish the uncomfortable feeling of a burden forced upon you.
TEXT.French: You find nothing more than a single room with a weird sign daubed on the wall, but after you left you can't banish the uncomfortable feeling of a burden forced upon you.
TEXT.German: You find nothing more than a single room with a weird sign daubed on the wall, but after you left you can't banish the uncomfortable feeling of a burden forced upon you.
TEXT.Italian: You find nothing more than a single room with a weird sign daubed on the wall, but after you left you can't banish the uncomfortable feeling of a burden forced upon you.
TEXT.Spanish: No encuentras nada más que una habitación solitaria con un extraño signo pintarrajeado en el muro. Tras marchar, no puedes evitar la incómoda sensación de que se ha colocado una pesada carga sobre tí.

TEXT.English: Suddenly, the veil is raised. Your thoughts swirl in their violent dance a last time, then calm. You look around, puzzled, but enjoying the unfamiliar feeling of tranquillity.
TEXT.French: Suddenly, the veil is raised. Your thoughts swirl in their violent dance a last time, then calm. You look around, puzzled, but enjoying the unfamiliar feeling of tranquillity.
TEXT.German: Suddenly, the veil is raised. Your thoughts swirl in their violent dance a last time, then calm. You look around, puzzled, but enjoying the unfamiliar feeling of tranquillity.
TEXT.Italian: Suddenly, the veil is raised. Your thoughts swirl in their violent dance a last time, then calm. You look around, puzzled, but enjoying the unfamiliar feeling of tranquillity.
TEXT.Spanish: De pronto, el velo queda levantado. Tus pensamientos giran en su violenta danza una última vez antes de calmarse. Miras a tu alrededor, intrigado, pero disfrutando de la poco familiar sensación de tranquilidad.

TEXT.English: You find a room with a statue and several chairs, desks and cupboards. Suddenly the eyes of the statue flash in a red shine, and the furniture begins to move.
TEXT.French: You find a room with a statue and several chairs, desks and cupboards. Suddenly the eyes of the statue flash in a red shine, and the furniture begins to move.
TEXT.German: You find a room with a statue and several chairs, desks and cupboards. Suddenly the eyes of the statue flash in a red shine, and the furniture begins to move.
TEXT.Italian: You find a room with a statue and several chairs, desks and cupboards. Suddenly the eyes of the statue flash in a red shine, and the furniture begins to move.
TEXT.Spanish: Encuentras una habitación con una estatua y múltiples sillas, mesas y armarios. De pronto los ojos de la estatua se llenan de un profundo brillo rojo, y los muebles comienzan a moverse.

TEXT.English: Some Bandits are using the Lair as their Hideout. They are not thrilled by your presence.
TEXT.French: Some Bandits are using the Lair as their Hideout. They are not thrilled by your presence.
TEXT.German: Some Bandits are using the Lair as their Hideout. They are not thrilled by your presence.
TEXT.Italian: Some Bandits are using the Lair as their Hideout. They are not thrilled by your presence.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Bandits are using the Lair as their Hideout. They are not thrilled by your presence.
